allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Update Voice Agent to use Adam \(serious male voice\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(P0\): Create generate-video orchestrator and thread runId

- Create generate-video.ts: Full 7-agent pipeline orchestrator
  that generates runId and calls agents sequentially
- Thread runId through Voice and Composer agents with warnings
  when not provided \(backward compatible\)
- Fix React video preview to show pipeline mode badge and
  placeholder warning for demo mode
- Add isPlaceholder flag to distinguish real vs demo videos

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
